resources.string: One Who makes his life better,\n by making others life better\n is an Aptamitra
Aptamitra will guide you to book\n the right professional for your\n essential needs.
Aptamitra will bridge between\n the delivery network and your\n local favourite stores
No More calls. Just message and\nGet more things accomplished with\na message via Aptamitra Near Me.

My City is A Great Place to Live !
 with 
 Aptamitra connecting your
civic issue to the right
public service professional
We have found many people finding it difficult
1) To know the right contact to report a civic issue.
2) To find a plumber / electrician / carpenter who is reliable and can do a quality job.
3) To get a door delivery of essential needs.
As a solution to the above, Aptamitra was born.
\t\t\t\tAptamitra is an online platform which connects users with certified service providers nearest to the user who can ensure availability, quality, reliability and diligent service.

\t\t\t\tWe work with the bureaucrats of the civic agencies like BBMP, BESCOM, BWSSB, BMTC, BDA, Fire , Emergency etc so that just by a click an issue is directed to the inbox of the concerned personnel.
\t\t\t\tWe aggregate quality suppliers and ensure availability, quality and reliability.
\t\t\t\tWe ensure that each service provider has a testimonial of accomplishments and is certified for skills by a third party.
\t\t\t\tWe do a thorough background check of our service providers for address verification and police verification check to ensure customer safety.

\t\t\t\tWe are working on a Mobile Application platform for service providers to accept your requests and to reach your location on time. The customer is able to track the movement of the service provider and know exactly the estimated time of arrival.
\t\t\t\tThe service charges are mentioned ahead of the Task. Product cost would be charged on actuals and has to be borne by the customer.
"What information is/may be collected from you?"
"How do we collect the your information?"
"With whom will your information be shared"
"How can you update/correct inaccuracies in your information?"

Dear Mitra, Namaste! Check out this must have app on your device . It is called as Aptamitra : Your Trusted Friend At Your Service . From resolving a streetlight issue to snake rescue, orFrom hiring a housemaid or repair professionals, to arranging a professional photographer for an event at home . Aptamitra connects you with the nearest professional service providers . They provide instant pick up and drop of anything all over Bengaluru . It can be keys, tiffin box, medicine,bill payment etc . Possibilities are endless . Basically they run errands for you . Just anything . Timings of service are 10 am to 11 pm .
